author: gdaniels
msg: Revamp WSDD, stage 1.
WSDD objects no longer tie tightly to an underlying DOM.  You can
dynamically create them and edit them, and when serialization to XML
is required, we use the SerializationContext (eating our own dog food,
as it were) to do it.  This gets rid of a number of problems, including
duplicate entries and messy files, which were plaguing the earlier
version.
Passes func tests, but still needs more cleanup.  Checking it in to
checkpoint it at this stage.

author: butek
msg: Internationalized org.apache.axis.providers.java package.

author: rineholt
msg: This should give some performance boost by trading off a small
amount of memory to guarantee full network packets are used.  Verified
this using MS Network monitor. Also force data to be flushed immediately
to network after writting.
